com.pcloud.networking.protocol

Interface ProtocolRequestWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, ProtocolWriter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BytesWriter

    public interface ProtocolRequestWriter
extends ProtocolWriter
    A contract for an object which can write data into a data sink

    Generally used to construct network requests

    See Also:
    BytesWriter

        ProtocolRequestWriter writeName(java.lang.String name)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: ProtocolWriter
        Write a key for a data pair

        The data is written in key - value pairs so every call of this method should be followed by one of the writeValue overloads.

        Specified by:
        writeName in interface ProtocolWriter
        Parameters:
        name - the key for this data pair
        Returns:
        a reference to this object
